content:
Announcing GoFSH 1.4.3 with the following changes:

  • Support for projects using FHIR version 5.0.0-snapshot1
  • Updates SUSHI dependency to SUSHI 2.2.6

Install or Update

To install or update to this release, run the following command:

$ npm install -g gofsh

More Information

For more details on this release, see the GoFSH 1.4.3 Release Notes.
